commit.message:
go-test.exp (go-set-goarch): Recognize powerpc*-*-*.

	* go.test/go-test.exp (go-set-goarch): Recognize powerpc*-*-*.
	(go-gc-tests): Skip nilptr.go on powerpc*-*-*.

From-SVN: r186642

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+	* go.test/go-test.exp (go-set-goarch): Recognize powerpc*-*-*.
+	(go-gc-tests): Skip nilptr.go on powerpc*-*-*.
